lac.cnclib.net.mrudp

Class MrUdpNodeConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.cnclib.net.mrudp.MrUdpNodeConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeConnection

    public class MrUdpNodeConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeConnection
    Class that encapsulates the connection between Remote (Mobile) Clients and the SDDL Gateways.
    Author:
    lincoln
